name: Puzzletronics Digital Infinite
description:
Puzzletronics Digital Infinite is a minimalist puzzle in the style of jigsaw. The player must move pieces to form logical circuits while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack.
Challenge yourself through 135 different levels and with varying levels of difficulty, knowing the behavior of logic gates and digital logic.



Characteristics:
  • 135 Different levels and with random pieces arrangement.
  • Calm and relaxing soundtrack.
  • Minimalist and colorful environment.
  • Lots of different pieces.
